text: El Granero Dam (Spanish: Presa del Granero, also known as the Luis L. Leon Dam) is an embankment dam on the Rio Conchos in north-central Chihuahua, Mexico. The dam was completed in 1968 to provide irrigation and flood control for the lower Rio Conchos valley. ==See also== *List of dams and reservoirs#Mexico *List of lakes in Mexico Category:Dams in Mexico Category:Embankment dams Category:Dams completed in 1968
title: El Granero Dam
